page.title: 03ECONOMICS
page.content: This sample survey used men and women aged 30-40.There were 17 ladies and 8 men from {Woodley C of E}and 23 ladies and 21 men from{Beechwood.}All the ladies used a bank in{Woodley.}All the groups had 4 people with a life policy in another area.Only{Beechwood ladies had giro anywhere but{W oodley. C of E men had 4 people with stocks and shares while{Beechwood} men and { {C of E}ladies had the most (6) with pension fund.None of the groups had many people using{Giro}and{C of E}men used none at all.The womens' groups had a lot more people with{Unit Trusts (the women had 24 while the men only had 3 people who had{Unit Trust.)}The {Beechwood}ladies mostly used a {Building Society}in{Woodley}(20 did) as did all the groups. In all groups {Woodley post office}was used the most. {}
